Class AuthorizationResponse

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AuthorizationResponse>

    public class AuthorizationResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<AuthorizationResponse>
    The carrier type of the list returned by the AuthorizationManager.authorizeDocids method.

    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthorizationResponse

        public AuthorizationResponse(boolean valid,
                     java.lang.String docid)
        Makes an AuthorizationResponse. If valid is true, then status is set to PERMIT. If valid is false, status is set to DENY.
        Parameters:
        valid - indicates that authorization was successful (valid)
        docid - the docid for which authorization succeeded - should not be null or empty

      • AuthorizationResponse

        public AuthorizationResponse(AuthorizationResponse.Status status,
                     java.lang.String docid)
        Makes an AuthorizationResponse.
        Parameters:
        status - the Status of this response
        docid - The docid for which authorization succeeded - should not be null or empty
        Since:
        2.4

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Tests whether authorization was valid (permitted).
        Returns:
        true if status is PERMIT, false otherwise
